titleStmt.title: Whereas many and great inconveniences have happened to His Majesties subjects of this kingdom ... by the Lord Deputy and Council, Arran.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Deputy.
Arran, Richard Butler, Earl of, d. 1686.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke and John Crooke ... and are to be sold at His Majesties Printing-House ... and at Joseph Wild ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first 3 lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
"Given at the Council chamber in Dublin, the 6th day of June 1683"--leaf [3]
Imperfect: faded, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
